directiveList.name: LyBadge
directiveList.inputs:
[
  "bg",
  "color",
  "raised",
  "disabled",
  "outlined",
  "elevation",
  "shadowColor"
]

variableList.name: DEFAULT_BG
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_BG = "primary"

variableList.name: DEFAULT_POSITION
variableList.children: const DEFAULT_POSITION = "startTop"

variableList.name: STYLE_PRIORITY
variableList.children: const STYLE_PRIORITY = -2

ngModuleList.name: LyBadgeModule
ngModuleList.children: import { LyBadgeModule } from '@alyle/ui/badge'
